H0.text: What city state was ruled by Lorenzo de' Medici. Venice

H1.text: What city state was ruled by Lorenzo de' Medici. Milan

H2.text: What city state was ruled by Lorenzo de' Medici. Rome

H3.text: What city state was ruled by Lorenzo de' Medici. פירנצה

A4.text: Cosimo was succeeded by his son Piero, who was, soon after, succeeded by Cosimo's grandson, Lorenzo in 1469.

A5.text: Following Lorenzo de' Medici's death in 1492, he was succeeded by his son Piero II.
